headline: Why Regency Centers, CME Group, And Trinity Industries Are Winners For Passive Income
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Regency Centers, CME Group, and Trinity Industries have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of over 4%. Regency Centers Regency Centers Corporation (NASDAQ:REG) is national owner, operator, and developer of shopping centers located in suburban trade areas with compelling demographics. Do
